q.quest: If a wire has a current of 6 and a resistance of 5, what is the flowing voltage?

What protocol is used to COMMUNICATE with embedded electronics?#1. JTAG#2. SPI#3. USB#4. COM+
What protocol is used to DEBUG embedded electronics?#1. JTAG#2. SPI#3. USB#4. COM+
What electric component is used to store electricity for a QUICK discharge?#1. Resistor#2. Flash Memory#3. Capacitor#4. Batteries
What electric component is used to store electricity for a SLOW discharge?#1. Resistor#2. Flash Memory#3. Capacitor#4. Batteries
Which item is not an embedded-exclusive processor?#1. BCM2773K#2. AMD G-Series#3. ATMEL megaAVR#4. Intel Atom

Arduinos can natively interface with the ProcessingJS class on Android OS?#1. true#2. false
